mapper.select: select id, user_id, inviter_level, order_form_id, order_form_product_id, commission_transfer_in_id, commission_rate, commission_amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, quantity_deal, quantity_refund, is_paid, is_transfer from nxt_commission where id = #{id}

select id, user_id, inviter_level, order_form_id, order_form_product_id, commission_transfer_in_id, commission_rate, commission_amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, quantity_deal, quantity_refund, is_paid, is_transfer from nxt_commission limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into nxt_commission(user_id, inviter_level, order_form_id, order_form_product_id, commission_transfer_in_id, commission_rate, commission_amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, quantity_deal, quantity_refund, is_paid, is_transfer) values (#{userId}, #{inviterLevel}, #{orderFormId}, #{orderFormProductId}, #{commissionTransferInId}, #{commissionRate}, #{commissionAmount}, #{datelineCreate}, #{datelineEnd}, #{quantityDeal}, #{quantityRefund}, #{isPaid}, #{isTransfer})
mapper.update:
update nxt_commission
user_id = #{userId},
inviter_level = #{inviterLevel},
order_form_id = #{orderFormId},
order_form_product_id = #{orderFormProductId},
commission_transfer_in_id = #{commissionTransferInId},
commission_rate = #{commissionRate},
commission_amount = #{commissionAmount},
dateline_create = #{datelineCreate},
dateline_end = #{datelineEnd},
quantity_deal = #{quantityDeal},
quantity_refund = #{quantityRefund},
is_paid = #{isPaid},
is_transfer = #{isTransfer},
where id = #{id}
